title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:action_on_block_break'
- Executes an Entity Action Type or a Block Action Type when the player breaks a block.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the player when a block is broken.

block_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the block that is broken.

block_condition.description: If set, the specified actions will only trigger when this block condition is met by the broken block.

only_when_harvested.description: If this is true, the specified actions will only execute when the player succeeds in harvesting the block (e.g. they will not trigger when stone is broken by hand).
